channel.title: [508] NPCs Moving When new MapData is Loaded
channel.description: For some reason, the NPCs spawned move around when a new region is loaded, or the player moves too far away from them. Why is this, and how can I fix it? Thanks!

item.title: [508] NPCs Moving When new MapData is Loaded
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

I should look into it sometime… I don’t really know where to start, though…
